posts.content:
Hi ,
well after months of indecision I have decided to let my Split go to someone who can enjoy it as much as I have.

Below is brief description , full details available to those interested
The Bus will be at DubFreeze for those interested in a look

1964 13 window deluxe ( samba )
Diesel Tdi covers-ion
Freeway flier Box
280mm vented disc brakes
power steering / rack and pinion conversion
2" narrowed beam
Volksheaven IRS kit
Porsche Teledials
Front and rear heaters
Body has had a sympathetic restoration keeping the character intact, new floor pans, cab floor, outriggers, inner / outer lower, cab steps. A post repair sections, then gravitexed and painted in 2k and arches sealed and stone chipped . Basically will last another 50 years if looked after !

Front Safaris and side pop outs
Porsche ratty tombstones , passenger on swivel base
Fridge and Cooker

More reliable and fun than my t5 , cruises at 65 and gives 40 mpg

Needs using a lot full spec can be given to those interested
Â£22000.00 serious offers only and don't even think about it if you want to paint it

Contact Dave on 07821 856647 live in the sticks so will answer any questions as quick as I can
Email cowpuccino@aol.com
The bus is located in Shropshire

Thanks for looking !!!

Hi ,
As requested gutter pics and tdi install

The gutters are solid , might not be pretty but in keeping , the van is ratty with up together running gear .
To answer the battery tray query , the complete pan in the engine department was replaced so new battery trays on both sides and fully painted , solid as good as new

Hi,

Just out of interest, have you got the magazine that this bus was featured in - thought it may be worth mentioning it in the ad if you have as it may add a little to the provenance of the bus's history!

Cheers

Hello Ernie

Yes have seen it but not got a copy , Andrew who built the bus originally did show me it , would like a copy myself
The bus even has an original contact detail for the first owner !!!
Thanks again

Pm me your mobile number mate & we'll meet up at Dubfreeze & you can have my copy - be nice to keep it with the bus!

Cheers

author.location: Essex but I'm nothing like the twats on the telly.
